import re

def compare_number_arrays_order(string1: str, string2: str):
    pattern = ''
    list1 = [float(i) for i in list(re.findall(pattern, string1))]
    list2 = [float(i) for i in list(re.findall(pattern, string2))]
    return list1 == list2

import re

def compare_number_arrays_order(string1: str, string2: str):
    pattern = '-?\\d+\\.\\d+|-?\\d+'
    list1 = [float(i) for i in list(re.findall(pattern, string1))]
    list2 = [float(i) for i in list(re.findall(pattern, string2))]
    return list1 != list2
